posts.content:
Saw two spitties, one (with a puck on tow) parked up on the A449 Penn Road, opposite Mount Pub, Wolverhampton on Friday afternoon whilst on my way in to Wolverhampton at 4 o'clock ish.
On my return about two hours later, recovery had just turned up for the one without puck.
Hope the day turned out to be not too catastrophic for you.
